algorithm_technique: Brute-force checking of all possible first two numbers, then validating the sequence
problem_summary_simple: Check if a string of digits can form an additive sequence.
problem_summary_technical: Iterates through all possible splits for the first two numbers and recursively checks if the rest of the string follows the additive property.
key_insights: The problem requires exploring all valid starting pairs for the additive sequence.
Leading zeros in the sequence numbers are strictly forbidden.
A helper function for string addition is needed, handling potential large numbers.
